pr_title: Float loot tracker groups to top of list when obtaining drop

timeline.message: Loot tracker panel now attempts to push the related group box to the top of the panel upon receiving a drop

timeline.bodyHTML:
Since the common case will not require reordering you can optimize this via

int idx = logsContainer.getComponentZOrder(box);
if (idx > 0) {
  logsContainer.remove(idx);
  logsContainer.add(box, 0);
}
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: Good point! Implemented the change as recommended and verified it's still functioning as expected.
replies.author: Vidyogamasta

timeline.message: Optimized loot tracker to not add/re-add a box to the top of the list if it's already at the top of the list.
